title: Track Order Page Loads with Valid Tracking ID
description: Verify that the Track Order page loads order details correctly when a valid tracking ID is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the Track Order page.
Enter a valid tracking ID into the tracking ID input field.
Submit the tracking ID.
Check that the order status, items list, shipping details, and payment status are displayed correctly.

title: Track Order Page Handles Invalid Tracking ID Gracefully
description: Verify that the Track Order page shows an appropriate error message when an invalid or non-existent tracking ID is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the Track Order page.
Enter an invalid or non-existent tracking ID.
Submit the tracking ID.
Check that a clear and user-friendly error message is displayed indicating the tracking ID is invalid or no order found.

title: Real-Time Updates on Order Status
description: Verify that the order status updates in real-time on the Track Order page when the order status changes on the backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the Track Order page with a valid tracking ID.
Verify initial order status and details are displayed.
Simulate an order status update from the backend using Socket.IO.
Verify that the order status on the page updates automatically without page refresh.

title: Invoice Page Loads Correct Invoice Data
description: Verify that the Invoice page loads correct billing and order details for a valid order ID.

steps.description: Navigate to the Invoice page.
Enter a valid order ID.
Submit the order ID.
Check that invoice details including product items, prices, totals, billing address, and payment info are displayed accurately.

title: Invoice Page Handles Invalid Order ID
description: Verify that the Invoice page displays an appropriate error message when an invalid or non-existent order ID is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the Invoice page.
Enter an invalid or non-existent order ID.
Submit the order ID.
Verify an error message is shown indicating invoice data could not be found or order ID is invalid.

title: Invoice Download and Print Options Available
description: Verify that the user can download or print the invoice correctly from the Invoice page.

steps.description: Navigate to the Invoice page with a valid order ID.
Click on the download invoice button.
Check that the invoice downloads correctly in a standard format (e.g., PDF) with all invoice details intact.
Click on the print invoice button.
Verify that the print dialog opens with a properly formatted invoice ready for printing.

title: API /api/tracking/{trackingId} Returns Order Tracking Details
description: Verify the API endpoint returns accurate order tracking details for a valid trackingId.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/tracking/{trackingId} with a valid trackingId.
Check that the response HTTP status code is 200.
Verify that the response body contains order items, grand total, and current status.

title: API /api/tracking/{trackingId} Handles Invalid TrackingId
description: Verify the API returns appropriate error responses for invalid or missing trackingId parameter.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/tracking/{trackingId} with an invalid trackingId or empty parameter.
Check that the API returns an error status code such as 404 or 400.
Verify that the error message clearly indicates the issue (e.g., 'Tracking ID not found').

title: API /api/tracking/{orderId} Returns Invoice Details
description: Verify the API endpoint returns correct invoice details for a valid orderId.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/tracking/{orderId} with a valid orderId.
Check that the response status code is 200.
Verify response contains the comprehensive invoice details matching the order.

title: API /api/tracking/{orderId} Handles Invalid OrderId
description: Verify the API responds with proper error for invalid or not found orderId.

steps.description: Send a GET request to /api/tracking/{orderId} with an invalid or non-existent orderId.
Verify the API returns an error code such as 404.
Verify the error response provides clear information about the invalid orderId.

title: Frontend Responsive UI Checks Across Devices
description: Verify that the Track Order and Invoice pages render correctly and remain usable on different screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Load both pages on desktop browser with various resolutions.
Verify UI elements are properly laid out and accessible.
Load pages on tablet and mobile devices or emulators.
Check that all content fits screen, text is readable, and user controls are usable.

title: API Response Time Performance Under Load
description: Ensure API endpoints /api/tracking/{trackingId} and /api/tracking/{orderId} respond within acceptable time limits even under simulated load.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent GET requests to /api/tracking/{trackingId} with valid tracking IDs.
Verify the average API response time is within predefined acceptable thresholds (e.g. under 1 second).
Simulate multiple concurrent GET requests to /api/tracking/{orderId} with valid order IDs.
Verify response times remain within acceptable limits.

title: Secure API Access with Path Parameters
description: Verify that the API endpoints properly validate and sanitize path parameters to prevent injection or unauthorized data access.

steps.description: Send requests to /api/tracking/{trackingId} and /api/tracking/{orderId} with maliciously crafted path parameter values.
Verify API does not execute injection attacks or expose unauthorized data.
Verify the API returns error codes for bad parameters.
